review: Great app for mobile banking. Easy to use and secure. I can check my balance and transfer money quickly.
The app keeps crashing when I try to transfer money. Very frustrating experience. Needs urgent fix.
Good features but needs better UI design. The interface is a bit confusing. Overall satisfied with the service.
Excellent customer service and fast transactions. Highly recommend to everyone! Best banking app in Ethiopia.
App is slow and sometimes doesn't load. Needs improvement in performance and stability.
Love the new update! Fingerprint login is very convenient. Makes banking so much easier.
Cannot login after the latest update. This is unacceptable. Please fix this issue immediately.
Decent app but transaction fees are too high. Would be better if they reduced the charges.
Very reliable and secure. I've been using it for months without any problems. Highly satisfied.
The app interface needs modernization. Looks outdated compared to other banking apps.
